CASHIER
Professional Summary
Results-oriented, strategic sales professional with two years in the Retail industry.
Cashier who is highly energetic, outgoing and detail-oriented.
Handles multiple responsibilities simultaneously while providing exceptional customer service.
Reliable and friendly team member who quickly learns and masters new concepts and skills.
Passionate about helping customers and creating a satisfying shopping experience.
Core Qualifications
Cash handling accuracy Mathematical aptitude Organized Time management Detail-oriented
Excellent multi-tasker Strong communication skills Flexible schedule Proficient in MS Office

EXPERIENCE

Receive payment by cash, check, credit cards, vouchers, or automatic debits.
Issue receipts, refunds, credits, or change due to customers.
Assist customers by providing information and resolving their complaints.

Greet customers entering establishments.
Answer customers' questions, and provide information on procedures or policies.
Process merchandise returns and exchanges.
Maintain clean and orderly checkout areas and complete other general cleaning duties, such as mopping floors and emptying trash cans.
Stock shelves, and mark prices on shelves and items.
Count money in cash drawers at the beginning of shifts to ensure that amounts are correct and that there is adequate change.
Calculate total payments received during a time period, and reconcile this with total sales.
Monitor checkout stations to ensure that they have adequate cash available and that they are staffed appropriately.
Assist with duties in other areas of the store, such as monitoring fitting rooms or bagging and carrying out customers' items.
Sort, count, and wrap currency and coins.
Compute and record totals of transactions.
Compile and maintain non-monetary reports and records.
Weigh items sold by weight to determine prices.
Cash checks for customers.

<JD_START>
Job Title: PT Food Lion To Go Associate

Location: Courtland, VA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Address: USA-VA-Courtland-28344 Southampton Pkwy

Store Code: Store 02111 Front End (7229491)

Food Lion has been providing an easy, fresh and affordable shopping experience to the communities we serve since 1957. Today, our 82,000 associates serve more than 10 million customers a week across 10 Southeastern and Mid-Atlantic states.

Primary Purpose

Provide fast, easy, flexible and friendly service to our customers through the achievement of Food Lion customer service standards. Responsible for assisting the Food Lion To-Go Lead in maintaining standards according to Food Lion's standard practice manual. Maximize sales through excellent customer service.

Duties And Responsibilities

 Smiles, greets each customer, uses name whenever possible and provides prompt, accurate and friendly service while engaging customers to create a positive shopping experience Exhibit behaviors that align with Food Lion's guiding principles, core values, vision, and strategy Ability to shop multiple customer orders using the designated tools and equipment Recognize or differentiate between all types of produce carried in the store, including differences between varieties of similar classes of products (e.g., apples, lettuce, etc.) Substitute items when requested Scan, bag, and label the purchase efficiently and accurately, while following established company policy and procedure Verify all customer IDs presented and observe store policies pertaining to the sale of alcoholic beverages Assist customers picking up orders Complete Accountability Form from end to end process Is courteous and helpful to other associates Wears the Food Lion uniform with apron, complete with name badge, when on duty, has a neat and clean appearance while adhering to the Food Lion dress code Controls store’s expenses through proper use of store supplies such as receipt tape, bags and cleaning supplies Adheres to all company guidelines, policies and standard practices Observes and corrects all unsafe conditions that could cause associate or customer accidents Notify QA of any cleaning issues or maintenance required for To-Go area and equipment Successfully complete Computer Based Training (CBT) and Training Aid courses Performs all other duties as assigned Must be able to meet the physical requirements of the position, with or without reasonable accommodations

Qualifications

 High school graduate or equivalent preferred Good interpersonal, communication and customer service skills Desire to work in a team environment Ability and willingness to learn multiple tasks and technical requirements of the job Must meet minimum age requirements, when applicable, to perform specific job functions

Physical Requirements

 Ability to use computers, smart devices, and other communication systems required to perform job functions Perform repetitive hand and arm motions Bend and lift products weighing up to 15 lbs. continuously, 25 lbs. frequently, and 50 lbs. on occasion Pull or push up to 75 lbs. on occasion Be able to handle a variety of substances associated with cleaning and packaging materials, fresh fruits, vegetables, house plants/flowers and household cleaners Stand 100% of the time with frequently walking short distances Frequent reaching and grasping at waist level; occasionally above shoulder or below waist level Meet established volume activity standards for the position Tolerate working in extreme hot/cold temperatures for up to 20 minutes at a time, including inclement weather Have sufficient visual ability to check ID cards

Food Lion provides equal employment opportunities to all associates and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth and related conditions) national origin, age, disability, sexual orientation, veteran status, gender identity or gender expression or any other characteristic protected by law.

Job Requisition: 269670_external_USA-VA-Courtland

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
<JD_END>
